Articles.Content: This has been around for a crazy long time but is there a reason why the game won't predict burn times until you've throttled all the way up? Its not just after staging, even switching to an already active flight maneuver nodes read "N/A". Is this something that can be fixed easily?

Yes, it should be easily fixed since no less than 4 mods do it correctly (Engineer, MechJeb, AlarmClock, Remote Tech)

Its just a matter of doing the math based on part specs instead of last known thrust.

Let's bump this, we've been waiting for too long.

Also, when do we get that damned Kerbal-Engineer dV-per-stage-reader ?
When you have a Node Maneuver system which give maneuvers-cost in m/s the first question that come is "how much do I have left ?" and it is a critical tools to learn the distinction between high-thrust and high Impulse.
